dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Tennis Australia: AV infringements - TENNIS AUSTRALIA_NRID12516]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 17, 2006 12:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; JonnyH@nr-online.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Tennis Australia: AV infringements - TENNIS
AUSTRALIA_NRID12516]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Tennis Australia: AV infringements - TENNIS
AUSTRALIA_NRID12516
Date:         Tue, 17 Jan 2006 02:21:46 -0000
From:         Jonny Hartley <JonnyH@nr-online.com>
To:         <ricardocabeza@hotmail.co.uk>
CC:         abuse@theplanet.com



NetResult Internal Reference:  Tennis Australia_NRID12516



Please quote the above Tennis Australia_NRID12516 reference in all
communications with us regarding this issue.



Dear Sirs,



We write on behalf of Tennis Australia in respect of certain intellectual
property rights including Audio Visual content.



We have noticed that your website, http://www.footballstreaming.info/ is
displaying and/or offering Tennis Australia Audio Visual (A/V) content.



As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from Tennis Australia to
use this content, your present use is an infringement of Tennis Australia's
rights.



Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
websites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.



In the absence of your website ceasing to display Tennis Australia content,
our client will be left no choice but to take formal action.



Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
express or implied waiver of any of Tennis Australia's rights or remedies,
including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not explicitly
stated, whether current or in the future, all of which are expressly
reserved.



Formal Declaration



I hereby state that Tennis Australia are the owner of the exclusive rights
referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf with
respect to internet monitoring and compliance.



On behalf of Tennis Australia, I hereby state that I have a good faith
belief that use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorised
by Tennis Australia, its agents, or the law.



I, Jonny Hartley, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United
States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury
that the information in the notice is accurate.



We thank you for your cooperation.



Yours sincerely,



Jonny Hartley



NetResult

A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House

583 Fulham Road

London

UK SW6 5UA



Tel: 0044 207 471 1730





Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.





-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------

NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management

-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------












- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
